_A_LIST_CLASS_ITEM_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: CSS class for each item in the list
_A_LIST_CLASS_MAIN_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: CSS class for each parent element
_A_LIST_COMPONENT_DESCRIPTION_: The AList component allows easy rendering of lists with flexible configuration options for data presentation.
_A_LIST_DATA_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Array with the data to be rendered
_A_LIST_GROUP_CLASS_GROUP_DESCRIPTION_: Specify the CSS class for the main list or item.
_A_LIST_GROUP_IS_DATA_SIMPLE_ARRAY_DESCR: This example demonstrates the use of the is-data-simple-array property in the component to handle different data types: simple arrays and nested hierarchies.
_A_LIST_GROUP_IS_DATA_SIMPLE_ARRAY_HEADE: Usage with Simple Arrays and Nested Hierarchies
_A_LIST_GROUP_IS_HTML_DESCRIPTION_: This example shows the use of the is-html property in the component in conjunction with the a-switch component to dynamically control the list display between text and HTML format.
_A_LIST_GROUP_IS_HTML_HEADER_: Display of Lists in Text or HTML Format
_A_LIST_GROUP_SEPARATOR_DESCRIPTION_: This example shows the use of the separator property in the component to set custom separators between items.
_A_LIST_GROUP_SEPARATOR_HTML_DESCRIPTION: The content used to separate items of a list can also be specified in HTML format. The content will be sanitized.
_A_LIST_GROUP_TAG_DESCRIPTION_: Using the component to dynamically switch between ordered (ol) and unordered (ul) lists via the tag property.
_A_LIST_IS_DATA_SIMPLE_ARRAY_PROP_DESCRI: Indicates whether only a simple array without objects is used
_A_LIST_IS_HTML_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: If true, an HTML list (<ul><li>...</li></ul>) is created. Otherwise, a text list is generated (<span>...</span>)
_A_LIST_KEY_CHILDREN_DESCRIPTION_: The key-children property allows items to have their own child elements, enabling the presentation of hierarchical data.
_A_LIST_KEY_CHILDREN_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Key for sub-items, if data is an array of objects
_A_LIST_KEY_ID_DESCRIPTION_:
This example demonstrates the use of the key-id property in the component to assign a unique identifier to each item in the list. This is particularly useful when the list is composed of an array of objects and each object has a unique key (ID).

In the second example, the label key (label) is used as an identifier for the list items.
_A_LIST_KEY_ID_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Key for unique IDs, if data is an array of objects (for performance improvement)
_A_LIST_KEY_LABEL_CALLBACK_DESCRIPTION_: The key-label-callback property allows for a custom transformation of the item labels.
_A_LIST_KEY_LABEL_CALLBACK_PROP_DESCRIPT: Function to generate labels with two parameters (item and itemIndex), if data is an array of objects
_A_LIST_KEY_LABEL_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Key for the label to be displayed, if data is an array of objects
_A_LIST_LIST_ITEM_TAG_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: HTML tag for the items in the list
_A_LIST_SEPARATOR_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Separator between items in the list.
_A_LIST_SEPARATOR_HTML_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: Separator between items in HTML format.
_A_LIST_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: Custom content for each item in the list
_A_LIST_TAG_PROP_DESCRIPTION_: HTML tag for the entire list
_A_LIST_WITH_SLOT_DESCRIPTION_: A list with custom content in the items through the slot.
